text: b) Consider a spring-mass system described by the initial value problem 2"+ cx’ + 9z = cos(3t), x(0)=0, 2'(0)=2. (3) where ¢ > 0 is the damping coefficient. Find the steady periodic part of the solution (the part of the solution which remains as ¢ — o) of this problem, and find its amplitude as a function of ¢. Do not find the transient part.
